<title level="1" right="Rules">[Smoke](/Rules.aspx?ID=2845)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Wind can carry smoke far in front of the wildfire itself. Smoke imposes a circumstance penalty to visual Perception checks, depending on the thickness. It causes creatures viewed through significant amounts of smoke to be concealed, and it cuts off all visibility at half a mile or less. Near or within the wildfire, the combination of smoke and heated air require characters to hold their breath or suffocate (_Player Core_ 437).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
